DOC.brief_summary: To assess, in subjects who have ventral wall hernia repair, the time between the end of surgery and first bowel movement with the investigational MOA-728 regimen as compared with a placebo regimen.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluating IV MOA-728 for the Treatment of POI In Subjects After Ventral Hernia Repair
DOC.criteria: Males and females, ages 18 and older. Scheduled for ventral wall hernia repair with general anesthesia. Meets the American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status I, II, or III. Received investigational drug or procedure within 30 days of randomization. Women who are pregnant or lactating. Calculated creatinine clearance (CockcroftGault GRF) </= 50 mL/min.
